title: Handwritten Script
content:
Hi All,

I need help identifying this font. It's for the company I work for and no one seems to know what it is. I've tried identifont and whatthefont with no success.

The closest I've found is Coptek regular, but that is a lot more blocky.

Any help would be appreciated, even finding something that's really close but not perfect.

Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829001915im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo_5934.jpg)
author: erinj

comments.content:
If this is a logo, it's probably hand-made (not a font) and then digitized.  
The closer I can find is **[Mr Charles DNA](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829001915/http:/signdna.com/shop/index.php?main_page=product_info&cPath=1_15&products_id=101&zenid=8f6b02fb3c2248952e4bd35018c525b5)** by Dave Simpson [Sign DNA, 2004] but it's far from being an accurate match.
Yeah that's what I'm beginning to think. Thanks for the link I'll take a look and see what my boss says.
